abstract: The New York attorney general, Andrew M. Cuomo, urged Citigroup on Monday afternoon to eliminate bonuses for its top executives after the banking company said it would cut an additional 24,000 jobs.
lead_paragraph: The New York attorney general, Andrew M. Cuomo, urged Citigroup on Monday afternoon to eliminate bonuses for its top executives after the banking company said it would cut an additional 24,000 jobs.

headline.main: Cuomo Urges Citigroup to End Executive Bonuses
